channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management (Linux)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management (Linux)

item.title: CVE-2020-4494|2024-09-17T02:41:34.476Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20space%20management%20%28linux%29
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Client 8.1.7.0 through 8.1.9.1 (Linux and Windows), 8.1.9.0 trough 8.1.9.1 (AIX) and IBM Spectrum Protect for Space Management 8.1.7.0 through 8.1.9.1 (Linux), 8.1.9.0 through 8.1.9.1 (AIX) web user interfaces could allow an attacker to bypass authentication due to improper session validation which can result in access to unauthorized resources. IBM X-Force ID: 182019.
